data.mainHeading: Redefining intelligence for a new era
data.description: A gathering at the edge of possibility â€” where researchers, builders, and dreamers converge to reflect on the shape of intelligence. Set against the pulse of New York at the Javits Center, June 4 2025.

faqItems.title: What is the focus of this AI conference?
faqItems.content: The conference explores recent advancements in AI, machine learning, and their real-world applications across industries.

faqItems.title: Who should attend the event?
faqItems.content: This event is ideal for researchers, developers, business leaders, students, and anyone interested in the future of AI.

faqItems.title: Will the sessions be recorded?
faqItems.content: Yes, all keynotes and panel discussions will be recorded and made available to registered attendees after the event.

faqItems.title: Is there a virtual attendance option?
faqItems.content: Absolutely. A fully interactive virtual experience will be available for those unable to attend in person.

faqItems.title: How do I become a speaker?
faqItems.content: Submit a proposal through our Call for Speakers form. Submissions are reviewed by our advisory board.

faqItems.title: Are meals provided during the conference?
faqItems.content: Yes, lunch and refreshments are provided daily, with vegetarian and vegan options available.

faqItems.title: Can I volunteer at the conference?
faqItems.content: Yes, we welcome volunteers. Applications open one month before the event.

faqItems.title: Will there be networking opportunities?
faqItems.content: Definitely. There will be dedicated networking sessions, meetups, and social mixers throughout the event.

faqItems.title: Is there a student discount?
faqItems.content: Yes, students can apply for discounted registration with valid student ID.

faqItems.title: Where is the venue located?
faqItems.content: The conference will take place at the Downtown Innovation Center, easily accessible by public transit.
